def_en: A module is one of the separate parts of a course taught at a college or university.
A module is a part of a spacecraft which can operate by itself, often away from the rest of the spacecraft.

def_cn: （建筑物中的）构件，组件，模块
def_en: A module is one of a set of parts from which some buildings are made. Each module is made separately, and the completed modules are then joined together to form the building.

def_cn: (机器的)组件，部件;(尤指计算机的)模块，程序块
def_en: A module is a part of a machine, especially a computer, which performs a particular function.
